item.title: Mapesbury road bridge. Both sides on speed himos, 12th July
item.description:
Potholes in speed humps on both sides of the bridge. They are damaging my car every time I go over this bridge. Please look into this asap. Many previous notices flagging this issue. To date: No action :( Brent is the best. Let’s keep it there! Thanks for reading But note: action is larger than words!
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mapesbury Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mattress dumped on street corner, 12th July
item.description:
